page.title: 08Education Gorran School
page.content: The school day begins at 9 a.m. with assembly in the hall .Formal lessons of Maths and English take place in the morning.About half of the children eat a school dinner,the others bring a pack lunch.Favourite dinners are roast chicken,fish and chips,syrup pudding and meringues.In the afternoon we have topic work,art,craft and music.All the children have the opportunity to learn to play the recorder ,we also sing and and play musical insruments.P.E. also takes place in the afternoon.Football and netball in winter,cricket,rounders swimming and athletics in summer.We play matches against other schools and compete in the inter-school sports. Each year we take part in Harvest Festivals,carol services,concerts Christmas parties and educational visits.This year 30 children to camp.
